content: and weave in all ends youth / ladies hat r1 chain 3 11 hbhdc in 3rd chain from hook join 11 r2 chain 2 2hbhdc in each st around join 22 r3 chain 2 2hbhdc in next st hbhdc in next st repeat around join 33 r4 chain 2 2hbhdc in next st hbhdc in each of the next 2 sts repeat around join 44 gauge check circle should measure 4 ¾ across center note circle may be wavy this will flatten out in the next couple rounds r5-16 chain 2 hbhdc in each st around join 44 r17-20 chain 1 loosely single_crochet in each st around join 44 after r20 fasten_off and weave in all ends adult / men s hat r1 chain 3 12 hbhdc in 3rd chain from hook join 12 r2 chain 2 2hbhdc in each st around join 24 r3 chain 2 2hbhdc in next st hbhdc in next st repeat around join 36 r4 chain 2 2hbhdc in next st hbhdc in each of the next 2 sts repeat around join 48 gauge check circle should measure 5 across center note circle may be wavy this will flatten out in the next couple rounds r5-17 chain 2 hbhdc in each st around join 48 r18-22 chain 1 loosely single_crochet in each st around join 48 after r22 fasten_off and weave in all ends © 2016 my sweet potato 3 do not copy reproduce or publish any part of this document in any form sales of finished product are permitted but please credit my sweet potato 3 with the original pattern design
